channel.title: notablog.
channel.description: just an outlet for occasionally interesting personal side projects.

item.title: Building a blog with barely
item.description: Building a blog upon the foundations of a static site generator might appear to be counterintuitive. After all, aren't frequent updates the point, and blogs therefore inherently dynamic? But alas: we can have our cake and eat it, too!
item.dc:creator: Charlotte
